name: Deep Dive (codeforjoy)
description:
Controls: A and D or left and right arrow key, or game pad stick.

This is a short and dreamy exploration experience made solely by code_for_joy.

Tools used: Pen and paper, Inkscape, Photoshop, Unity, C#, Cubase, phone for recording sound, Audacity.

Font Josefin downloaded from Google Fonts and one sound recording downloaded from Freesound.org

Enjoy :)
